"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5420e5b0636872632e550000#post_5420e5b0636872632e550000
Eh; sort of disagree.  If we're talking about northwest Iraq then yeah it's future is the second worst shithole in the world with Syria being the number one spot.  The northwest part of Iraq for the last ten years has been a massive shithole and easily the most violent part of the country, but I have to massively agree on it's future being forever violent; at least for that region.

topics.body: I did something silly and kind of funny in minecraft; in thaumcraft there's these monsters called wisps in it and sometimes they're friendly.  I used something that can automatically spawn them into the game, but turns out that just cause you use the original friendly one as a base doesn't mean they're all friendly; so I took the original friendly one and renamed it "asshole" then put the thing to spawn them all in a glass box to act like a fishtank for them so now I have hundreds of flying assholes.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
